body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Wayne Davis and the customer's name is Ashley Robinson.  The conversation is about Rhode Island School of Design (a Art School ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Sunshine Telecom. My name is Alice. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alice, I'm having some issues with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I'll need to get a bit more information to assist you better. Can I please have your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, and can you also provide the ZIP code associated with your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's nine eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I will now look into your issue. This may take a few moments.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience. I've found the issue with your connection and it should be resolved within the next hour.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much, Alice. I really appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time and for choosing Sunshine Telecom. Have a great day.
